body.name: Amaste Drip Coffee Machine with 25 Oz Glass Pot, Retro Style Maker with Reusable Coffee Filter & Three Brewing Modes, 30minute-Warm-Keeping, Matcha Green
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: THIS IS DEFINITELY AN ESSENTIAL ART PIECE FOR YOUR DELICATE LIFE. AMASTE Retro Style Coffee Machine with Glass coffee pot with a classy design, it can perfectly ornament your kitchen, living room, and office. This Coffee Maker enables you to enjoy your favorite kinds of coffee such as cappuccinos and lattes. Also, the drip coffee machine doesn't hog too much space with the size of 6.3''*7.8''*10.8'', so you are able to carry it to any place.

SAVOR THE BEST QUALITY: Our premium quality coffee maker will brew you a rich, delicious, fresh coffee to you. Adjusting the strength that you want will make you unforgettable whether it is Mild, Medium, or Strong. This coffee machine comes with a spray head to distribute the water more evenly into your grounds to increase the smoothness of the brew while retaining the taste of the fresh bean.

YOU DON'T NEED TO SPEND A FORTUNE TO MAKE AN EXCELLENT CUP OF COFFEE AT HOME. This drip machine with a reusable coffee filter, means you don't have to worry about constantly buying paper ones. The Anti-drip design and visible water gauge allow for the coffee to seamlessly flow into the pot without any mess. What's more, the slim and easy-to-use drip coffee maker requires just the push of a button, and the filter is easily removed and lifted from the chassis for easy cleanup.

WHEN IT COMES TO COFFEE MAKERS THAT FUNCTION AS NICELY AS THEY LOOK, IT'S HARD TO BEAT AMASTE. Our drip maker will keep your freshly brewed coffee warm for 30 minutes to preserve flavor after brewing. At the same time, If it's not used for over 30 minutes, the coffee maker will shut down automatically to avoid overheating. Also, To help you determine how much coffee to use, the glass carafe and water tank are level marked.

WE WANT TO PROVIDE THE HIGHEST QUALITY PRODUCT AND SERVICES TO EVERYONE. Full essentials - spoon and user's manual. All of our products qualify for 1-year warranty. Don’t wait for a great drip coffee maker. Got it here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this little coffee maker. Makes a great pot of coffee and if I need a strong cup just flip the switch. The look is so nice and it’s a great space saver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: its a pourover spray system, coffee doesnt burn etc. but takes a minute or two. wonderful appearance and color, easy operation, easy controls, for a morning cup or two, its the best! the pkg was five star if that matters. its high end simple and sized right for two large cups daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Consume quickly after brewing.
reviews.reviewText: The Amaste Drip Coffee Machine in matcha green is a chic and stylish addition to any kitchen, boasting a retro design that catches the eye. This coffee maker comes with a 25 oz glass pot, a reusable coffee filter, and offers three brewing modes, making it a versatile choice for coffee enthusiasts.The visual appeal of the machine is a significant highlight. Its matcha green color and retro style add a touch of elegance to your kitchen countertop. The 25 oz glass pot is a perfect size for personal use, allowing you to brew just the right amount of coffee.However, there are some downsides to consider. The material used in the construction of the coffee maker may not be as durable as one would hope, potentially raising concerns about long-term use. Additionally, some users might find the machine a bit on the small side, making it less suitable for larger gatherings.One of the standout features of this coffee maker is the three brewing modes, which allow you to adjust the coffee's intensity to your liking. However, the downside is that the bottom part of the pot does not heat the coffee, so it doesn't stay warm for extended periods. You'll need to consume your coffee relatively quickly after brewing to enjoy it at the ideal temperature.In summary, the Amaste Drip Coffee Machine is a stylish choice for coffee lovers, offering customization and a compact size. While its chic design and versatility are appealing, the concerns about material durability, size, and the lack of prolonged heat retention may influence your decision. If you prioritize aesthetics and versatility over durability and keeping your coffee warm, this coffee maker could be a good fit for your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lord, I bought this after an edible!
reviews.reviewText: Whoa, dude, let me tell you about this mind-blowing coffee maker I got - the Amaste Drip Coffee Maker! I was like, totally in need of a coffee upgrade, you know, and this one caught my eye with its retro style. It's like stepping back in time to the chill vibes of the past.So, I ordered it, and when it arrived, it was like Christmas morning, but better 'cause there's coffee involved, man. The first thing I noticed was the 25 Oz glass coffee pot - like, it's so transparent, I can see the coffee swirling inside, and it's mesmerizing, man. I swear I could just stare at it for hours.And then, this coffee maker comes with a reusable coffee filter. That's like sustainability and all that eco-friendly stuff, you know? Mother Earth will be proud! I love that it's all about the three brewing modes too, so I can choose how I want my coffee to be, just like choosing between different dimensions of reality!But wait, there's more! It's got a 30-minute warm-keeping feature! Like, I can get lost in time while sipping on my coffee, and it'll still be warm! Talk about convenience, man.Oh, and get this: the name has "Matcha Green" in it. I mean, it's not just for matcha, but it adds this whole other layer of zen-like experience, connecting with nature, you know? It's like bringing the essence of green leaves and good vibes into my coffee ritual.All in all, I gotta say, this Amaste Drip Coffee Maker is a total game-changer for my morning routine. It's like the perfect companion to start the day off right, with a cup of joe that's made to perfection. I'm in coffee heaven, man! If you're looking to level up your coffee game, this baby is the way to go. Happy sipping, my fellow coffee enthusiasts! Peace and love! 🌈🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It quit working
reviews.reviewText: Very cute but has now quit working.. did not start using it until July and it is the end of November now ..Edit: this was originally put in at a short term rental unit. And a couple of renters had said the coffee pot did not work. Maintenance pulled it out. Replaced it with another one. I was over there recently and brought this one back home with me. I plugged it in, filled it with water and turned it on, nothing happened. Then I also pushed the button on the drip strength and, it worked. I ran it about 20 times to make sure it did work. It worked just like it’s supposed to! It’s so stinking cute I was very happy, I took it back over there and switched out the coffee pots! So, revising my review!! I added instructions to push both buttons on the inside of the cabinet door, where the coffee lives!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great little coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: The attractive appearance of this small coffee maker really appealed to me, but what convinced me to buy it was two specific features: the small size and the ability to brew bold coffee. I have been using it every day for a week now, and the coffee it makes is superb. I can use less coffee because the flavor on the boldest setting is so robust. I love the way it looks in my kitchen, and more importantly, it makes great coffee! I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute BUT drips like crazy!
reviews.reviewText: I love the looks of this coffee maker! I am redoing my small appliances in gold and black so this caught my eye! Beside that they were sold out of the Drew Barrymore black and gold one! I have only had it for 3 months or so and am going to throw it away or give it to my daughter if she wont mind cleaning coffee off her floor and cabinets every day! I dont know what it is but every time I pour the coffee it drips all over the place! I am sick of cleaning it not to mention my daughter moved in and its not big enough for all 3 of us now! It wasnt big enough for just my husband and I and always had to brew 2 times a day (because I am a cold brew freak) but now its up to 3 times a day! Besides that I drink cold brew and wait for it to cool down but since I am brewing so much now it melts all my ice! LOL I am getting the Drew Barrymore NOW!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little Coffee Pot
reviews.reviewText: Cute coffee pot, looks great and works great. VERY SMALL. The 5 line is barely even 2 large cups so beware if you need a pot for multiple people.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful coffee maker & Delicious coffee *my second Amaste purchase*
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Amaste coffee maker. I changed only due to colour preference after some renovations. I first had the butterscotch (called champagne) coloured Amaste coffee maker. This one is very beautiful in white (NOT ivory), with rose gold accents. It really is a rose gold hue, not regular gold colour. As with the first one I purchased (which works just fine and is packed away), it makes excellent tasting coffee. There are 3 level choices of brew. It is not a big coffee maker, but nice for 2 large mugs or 3 smaller cups, per pot. There is a glowing blue while it's brewing. The shut off works perfectly, for safety, about 15 mins after it's finished brewing. No paper filters needed, which is nice. Very happy with my purchase x 2 ! Would recommend 100% ps. to preserve the quality and to ensure it runs smoothly, clean it often. And dry it well each day, the pot and the inner lid/filter cups.
Tiene 3 grados de intensidad de cafe, he probado distintos y hasta ahora se hacen perfectos. La cafetera dara un toque distinto de buen gusto a tu cocina.

I replaced my 6mth old Keurig for this wonderful coffee maker. I missed the scent of coffee, and having the convenience of a pot of coffee. This is perfect for 1-2 people. It makes delicious coffee - I have only tried the medium strength setting, so far. I don't find it is slow to process, it is average, and 100% worth waiting for. The size is perfect for my needs, a small office kitchen space. The butterscotch (cream) colour choice is quite unique. I would buy this again! The suggested delivery time was 2 weeks, it actually arrived in 4 days. A nice surprise. I included a few photos for size comparison.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy if your in the UK!! You won't get it to brew I tried buying a converter still didn't work 😕 shouldn't be aloud to sell it over here.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un toque Vintage para tu cocina
reviews.reviewText: El color es perfecto, es super fácil de usar y se ve super bonita!
